explanation: The home route processes user input through a form defined in MessageForm.
It handles both GET requests for displaying the form and POST requests for form submission.
response.hook: Explore the home route handling GET and POST requests.
response.pitfall: Ensure form validation is handled correctly to prevent errors.
response.title: GET|POST / (branch 1)
response.why_it_matters: Understanding this route is crucial for managing user interactions within the application.
